page.title: 05Changing Times / 2
page.content: superfluous. There have been quite a few bungalows built in the vicinity recently. The church is still carrying on with new people taking an intrest. To day we unfortunately have not a residant Rector we have to share with a number of surrounding parishes. The Church, School,Forge and the Brooklands,with a few others are the old stone buildings,still blissfully carrying on today. The Parish Hall, which was built years gone by,is still retained and used regularly. One very useful service, which has recently been constructed, is that of the sewerage disposal unit and flush toilet facility."
